KEGG map with Gene symbols using Pathview
========================================================

```{r install libraries and setup}
#rm(list = ls())
#detach("package:pathview", unload=TRUE)
getwd()
knitr::opts_knit$get("root.dir") 
source("http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite('pathview')
biocLite('gage')
library(pathview)
?pathview
library(gage)
```
